div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1850 Bairat, c. 80 km. NE of Jaipur, Ra- jasthan, India, 1936-1937 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 33 AR Heliocles II: 1 Menander: 16 Apollodotus I?: 1 Antialcidas: 1 Hermaeus: 6 Indian punch-marked: 8 Disposition: Jaipur Gupta, JNSI 1946, pp. 24-9 The denomination of the Indo-Greek coins is not stated; they were presumably dr.
